name: Pineapple Dog Shit
description: Pineapple Dog Shit is a hybrid strain that may not sound appetizing, but its elite parentage of Pineapple Punch and Chemdawg 4 is enough to draw connoisseurs of old school genetics. Its name is derived from its sour, tar-like aroma that could arguably be compared to canine byproduct, but one look at this hybridâ€™s knobby, dense, crystal-covered buds may convince you to push past its unconventional aroma. For those of you less interested in the novelty of Pineapple Dog Shit, we reassure you: the taste is a more pleasant blend of sweet tropical and citrus flavors.
attributes_title: Happy, Uplifted, Euphoric, Relaxed, Creative, Lack of Appetite, Stress, Depression, Insomnia, Pain, Dizzy, Dry Mouth, Paranoid, Anxious
